summary: An American writer living in England gets entangled in a scheme by a beautiful blonde to murder her rich husband.
cast: Alex Nicol|Hillary Brooke|Sidney James|Susan Stephen|Paul Carpenter|Alan Wheatley|Peter Illing|Gordon McLeod|Joan Hickson|John Sharp|Hugh Dempster|Monti DeLyle|Christine Adrian|Ernest Blyth|Harry Brunning|Peter Evans|Chick Fowles|Angela Glynne|Howard Lang|Aileen Lewis|Richard Neller|Cleo Rose|Pat Ryan|Ian Selby
title: The House Across the Lake
